testcase.name: Create a new social networking comment - Example #1.1
testcase.system-out: Given service is up and running.............................................passed When I create a new comment with the following details "2004", "Sheyi Abdul", "sheyi@Abdul.com" and "Just commenting on this recent post of your holiday".passed Then I should get response of "2004", "Sheyi Abdul", "sheyi@Abdul.com" and "Just commenting on this recent post of your holiday" returned with status code of 201.passed
